extendedInfo.description: Quran Android is a free, open source Quran application for Android devices.  There are many features under development.  Please send us your feedback and feature requests and keep us in your prayers!Quran Android provides the following features:- Updated Index- Gapless audio playback- Ayah bookmarking- Ayah share- Ibn Katheer and Saady Tafsir- Audio recitations are available for streaming and downloading with highlighting support (tap the screen for to get the audio toolbar).- search- beta: night mode- beta: audio repeat- crystal clear Madani compliant images.- translations in many different languages (currently, Arabic Tafseer, English Sahih International Translation, French, German, Indonesian, Malay, Spanish, Turkish, Transliteration, Bosnian, Russian, Bengali, Kurdish, Somali, Dutch, Swahili, Malayalam, Azerbaijani, Tamil, and Urdu) with more coming soon.*Please Note* - we need phone state permissions so we can stop the audio playback when a phone call comes in (otherwise, it would continue playing).  also, we need internet to download data due to the limitation on non-sdcard memory on most android phones.Because Quran Android is an open source project, it makes it easy for anyone to contribute and help improve the project.  we are also open to hearing your suggestions to make Quran Android the best Quran application on the market.Recitations available:Abd El Basit - Abdul Basit Mujawwad - Abdullah Basfar - Abdurrahmaan As-Sudais - Abu Bakr Ash-Shaatree - Alafasy - Ghamadi - Hani Rifai - Husary - Husary Mujawwad - Hudhaify - Maher Al Muaiqly - Minshawy - Minshawy Mujawwad - Mohammad al Tablaway - Muhammad Ayyoub - Muhammad Jibreel - Saood Ash-Shuraym - Ibrahim Walk (English)Tags: Quran, Qur'an, Koran, Coran, Islam, Quran.com

reviews.title: MashaAllah
reviews.comment: MashaAllah.  It is the best app ever for Quran e Majeed. Keep it up. May Allah subhanahu wa taAla reward you for this. It is completely invaluable and completely big free. JazakAllah
reviews.author: Abdul Rafiq Katawazai

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: its one of the best apps :) easy and good (y))
reviews.author: benameure maria

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This app is pleasing to use and its easy to navigate Allah reward the people involved in making this possible
reviews.author: Ahmed Vadia

reviews.title: Tbarakalah
reviews.comment: Amazing app, well organized,  very helpful features,  for instance I loved tafseer muyassar of quran. Jazakom allah khayran
reviews.author: you tah

reviews.comment: True music makes u feel better but the quran makes ur heart feel better and makes u feel safe. Allho akbar  muhamed nabeye  aliyon imame al quran ketabe w al kaabaato keblate :D

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Really helpful, usable, fast and valuable App.
reviews.author: Ahmed Said

reviews.title: The BEST Qur\'an App out there!
reviews.comment: My favorite qur\'an app, beautiful interface, user-friendly, LOVE the search option... jazakum Allah khairan =))
reviews.author: Neira Ellaboudy

reviews.title: The best QURAN App.
reviews.comment: This is certainly the best Quran App on Android. Very easy to use and a very stable app. It feels like you\342\200\231re actually reading off the book. Excellent.
reviews.author: Saad Nagi

reviews.title: May Allah reward you
reviews.comment: Asalam Aleikum brother and sister. wow mashallah you created one of best quran app ever, is very useful to me alhamdulilah. It will be much better if you can add sheikh Ahmad Al Ajmy, because he is one of my favourite reciter, please please please.  Many thanks
reviews.author: Osman Ahmaduna

reviews.title: Absolute best Qur\'an
reviews.comment: I love this app. It has been wonderful to use and is the BEST Quran out there. I do wish, though, that there was a way to mark specific verses rather than pages.   May Allah bless the creators of this app for their deed.
reviews.author: Hafsa Mansoor

reviews.title: Big arabic on landscape mode, excellent translation
reviews.comment: Greatest free Quran with multiple language translations on the internet. Clean, fast, and looks very good. For better experience please add a search in translation features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Brilliant app.. Really efficient and easy to use! Well done!
reviews.author: Hafsah Ahmad

reviews.title: Great Free Quran Apps
reviews.comment: Wish it will support uthmani script in translation mode. Love it when the apps data now can be stored into sdcard without using 3rd party apps.
reviews.author: Syafiq Basri Shaari

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is a very nice app, i love the it represent the pages. It would be nice if you guys give the option to zoom the page so that one can recite QURAN if he/she wanted. 5 star
reviews.author: Musab ulhaque

reviews.title: Amazing Masha Allah
reviews.comment: This App is AWESOME!  by far the best Qur\'an app on Android May Allah bless the developers in their work and elevate their station in Jannah Ameen Keep up the good work bros Masalama
reviews.author: Haz Khalisadar

reviews.title: Malayalam translation not working in Android jelly bean
reviews.comment: Assalamu alaikkum. First of all congratulations for developing such a wonderful application.  However, I cannot view malayalam translation even though my OS is Android 4.1.1 version. Please try to fix it. Thank you.

Or how to make the audio to be downloaded and saved. Your_request@live.com

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Thanks for this great app. Exactly the kind of font I was looking for. It is easy to read and may Allah reward you for developing this great app. Jazakallah.
